title: 5 engagement rings inspired by the rock Cristiano Ronaldo bought his fiancé
description: Wowed by the 25-carat engagement ring Cristiano Ronaldo bought his longtime partner, Georgina Rodriguez? Shop similar diamond ring options here.
content:
• Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez are engaged after nine years of dating.
• Rodriguez's engagement ring is estimated to be worth up to $5 million and features a large oval-cut diamond, possibly between 20-25 carats.
• While some speculated the ring's image was AI-generated, a gemologist confirmed the design is realistic for high-profile clients.

International soccer superstar Cristiano Ronaldo and longtime girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez are engaged! Nine years is a long time to wait for an engagement ring, but when it looks like Georgina's ring from Ronaldo, you can't be mad. That rock is unreal.

It looks so unreal, that even our USA Today Shopping team had questions about whether the Instagram announcement was AI-generated.

Luckily, Lorraine Bratner, GIA-certified gemologist and Director of Sales and Service at James Allen, weighed in to help set the record straight.

"While many are quick to speculate that Cristiano Ronaldo's engagement ring may be AI-generated, I can say that the design details, particularly the carat weight, shape and setting, are entirely within the realm of what's possible in high-end jewelry today," Bratner said. "As someone who’s seen many large-carat diamonds up close, I can say that this style is absolutely in line with what high-profile clients and celebrities gravitate toward."

The diamond is reportedly valued at up to $5 million. He is, afterall, Cristiano Ronaldo.

Bratner weighed in on the look of the stone.

"Based on the images circulating, the center stone appears to be an oval cut diamond, likely ranging between 20-25 carats, possibly even more depending on finger size," says Bratner. "In an era where AI can generate hyper-realistic renderings, skepticism is natural, but this ring's proportions, clarity, and craftsmanship reflect the kind of piece created for elite clients."

Below, check out a few dazzling lookalikes, albeit smaller than the absolute rock on Rodriguez's finger:

Save up to 40% on jewelry during Blue Nile's Anniversary Sale

Blue Nile is celebrating 26 years of craftsmanship by offering up to 40% off select jewelry styles and up to 25% off engagement ring settings during their Anniversary Sale. The sale kicked off on Tuesday, August 12 and runs until Monday, September 15. Here's a look at top styles to shop during the Blue Nile Anniversary Sale:
summary: Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez have engaged after nine years of dating. The engagement ring is estimated to be worth up to $5 million and features a large oval-cut diamond, possibly between 20-25 carats. While some speculated that the ring's image was AI-generated, a gemologist, Lorraine Bratner, confirmed that the design is realistic for high-profile clients. The diamond is reportedly valued at up to €5 million.
shortSummary: Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez's engagement ring, estimated to be $5 million, is stunning but realistic, according to a gemologist.

How to watch soccer, Champions League, EPL, MLS this week
As many sports are on hiatus during the summer months, professional soccer continues to rage on!
Soccer is the most popular sport around the world for a variety of reasons, but one of which is its accessibility. It's easy to play, and can be found on TV almost any day of the week, if you look hard enough.
Whether you're just getting into the Champions League qualifying rounds, soaking up a little preseason English Premier League or all in on the Leagues Cup in MLS and Liga MX, we've got you covered with a full schedule and how to watch each game.
How to watch Champions League
The Champions League is in the midst of its qualifying rounds as the second round just wrapped up. Every Champions League match is available to stream live via Paramount+.
Watch 2025 Champions League on Paramount+
Champions League weekly schedule
Wednesday, Aug. 6
- Nice vs. Benfica - 3 p.m. - Watch on Paramount+
- Feyenoord vs. Fenerbahçe - 3 p.m. - Watch on Paramount+
How to watch English Premier League
Sunday's EPL Summer Series finale in Atlanta is available to watch with Peacock.
Stream 2025 EPL games on Peacock
EPL weekly schedule
Sunday, Aug. 3
- Bournemouth vs. West Ham United - 2 p.m.
- Manchester United vs. Everton - 5 p.m.
How to watch Leagues Cup
Phase one of the Leagues Cup continues this week as teams vie for points and seeding. Every game this week is available to watch with Apple TV's MLS Season Pass.
Watch the Leagues Cup on Apple TV
Leagues Cup weekly schedule
Friday, Aug. 1
- New York City vs. León - 6 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Columbus vs. Puebla - 7 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Houston vs. Mazatlán - 8:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Toluca vs. Montréal - 9 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- LAFC vs. Pachuca - 10:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Tigres vs. San Diego - 11 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
Saturday, Aug. 2
- Nashville vs. Aston Villa - 5 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- D.C. United vs. Ethiopia - 5 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Philadelphia vs. Eintracht Frankfurt - 5:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Orlando vs. Atlas - 6 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Miami vs. Necaxa - 7 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Pumas vs. Atlanta - 9 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- América vs. Minnesota - 9 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Salt Lake vs. Atlético de San Luis - 9:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Portland vs. Querétaro - 11 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
Sunday, Aug. 3
- Cincinnati vs. Juárez - 5:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Chivas de Guadalajara vs. Charlotte - 7:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Monterrey vs. New York - 8:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Colorado vs. Tijuana - 9:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- Seattle vs. Santos Laguna - 10:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV
- LA Galaxy vs. Cruz Azul - 10:30 p.m. - Watch on Apple TV

Save up to 25% on Blue Nile jewelry—including a dupe for Selena Gomez's engagement ring
Is there anything better than getting engaged to the love of your life? Well yes—getting to show off your sparkly new engagement ring, of course. Whether you're in the market for an engagement ring or just want an extra reason to spoil that special someone in your life (FYI: Mother's Day is fast approaching), Blue Nile Jewelry is currently offering 25% off engagement rings and fine jewelry.
The TikTok-loved jewelry brand has everything you need to perfect your accessory game this spring—or maybe forever. Plus, for anyone looking to invest in pieces inspired by their favorite celebrity engagement rings, Blue Nile has a gorgeous, yellow-gold ring that features a marquise diamond and mirrors the look of Selena Gomez's glitzy marquise diamond ring. Gomez's ring—which was given to her by her fiancé, music producer Benny Blanco—is proving to have a big influence on spring 2025's top engagement jewelry trends.
Ahead, take a look at some of the top jewelry deals to shop during Blue Nile's April Sparkle savings event, including a Gomez-inspired style:
Lab Grown Marquise Diamond Bezel Ring
Petite Twist Diamond Engagement Ring
Freshwater Cultured Pearl and White Topaz Hexagon Halo Pendant
Diamond Kite "Y" Necklace
Open Marquise Diamond Ring
What makes Blue Nile engagement rings special?
While Blue Nile has a ton of gorgeous jewelry pieces, Blue Nile engagement rings are renowned especially for their quality and craftsmanship. Each ring is carefully crafted using high-quality diamonds and precious metals, ensuring a stunning and durable piece of jewelry. Blue Nile offers a wide range of customizable options and special designer collections like the Zac Zac Posen collection and the Bella Vaughan collection, allowing you to create a unique ring that perfectly matches you and your partner's style and budget. Additionally, their diamonds are ethically sourced, so it's a purchase you can feel good about making.

Exclusive deal: Get $130 off across your first 4 boxes of meat at Good Chop
As August gives way to September, and with Labor Day approaching on September 1, there's no better time to plan a spectacular cookout. To ensure your end-of-summer barbeque is filled with fresh, high-quality food and good times, now is the perfect opportunity to stock your freezer with premium meats.
That's where Good Chop comes in. This premium meat delivery service specializes in providing the finest cuts of beef, chicken, pork and more, all sourced from American farms. And for a limited time, Good Chop is offering an exclusive deal just for USA TODAY readers: get a whopping $130 off across your first four boxes, delivered straight to your door.
Whether you're craving burgers, steak, chicken or sausage, you can take advantage of this fantastic offer and get $130 off your first four deliveries from Good Chop.
What is on the Good Chop menu?
Good Chop takes pride in offering a diverse selection of meats, ensuring that every meal is an unforgettable culinary adventure. Some of the Good Chop menu options include:
- Grass-Fed Beef: Savory, tender, and rich in flavor, these cuts are perfect for steak enthusiasts.
- Free-Range Chicken: Juicy, succulent, and ideal for a variety of dishes, from casseroles to gourmet salads.
- Sustainably-Sourced Pork: Delightfully marbled and flavorful, these cuts are perfect for roasting or grilling.
- Wild-Caught Seafood: Fresh, responsibly sourced fish and shellfish that bring the ocean’s bounty to your table.
How much does Good Chop cost?
Good Chop offers flexible pricing to cater to various needs and budgets. Here’s a glimpse into their pricing structure:
🥩 Medium Box, $99 per month (Originally $149): Ideal for individuals or small families, this plan includes a selection of up to 36 portions of high-quality cuts (six meat and seafood selections or up to 14 pounds) and the price per portion starts at $2.75.
🍗 Large Box, $219 per month (Originally $269): Perfect for medium-sized families, the Large Box includes 72 portions of sustainable meat (12 selections or up to 28 pounds) and the price per portion starts at $3.04.
🍖 Extra Large Box, $309 per month (Originally $359): Designed for larger households or the most dedicated meat enthusiasts, the Extra Large Box features 108 portions of premium cuts (18 selections or up to 42 pounds) and the price per portion starts at $2.86.
How does Good Chop deliver your food?
Good Chop’s meat delivery service is designed with convenience in mind. Subscribers receive their frozen selections in insulated, vacuum-sealed, eco-friendly packaging that ensures freshness from the moment it leaves the farm to when it reaches your table. With easy online ordering and customizable delivery schedules, enjoying premium meat has never been simpler.
What is Good Chop?
Good Chop is a subscription service that delivers meat and seafood to your door. All products are sourced from American farms and fisheries, supporting local economies.

Cristiano Ronaldo, Georgina Rodriguez engaged after nearly a decade together
Portuguese soccer star Cristiano Ronaldo has finally popped the big question.
The Manchester United legend scored the goal of a lifetime after proposing to his longtime partner Georgina Rodriguez, who confirmed their engagement while showing off a massive ring in an Instagram post Monday, Aug 11.
"Yes, I do. In this and in all my lives," Rodriguez wrote in a translated caption with a photo of her hand over Ronaldo's while donning the spectacle oval jewel.
Fans of Netflix reality series "I am Georgina" know Rodriguez has long awaited the overdue proposal, prompting many fans to ponder whether the milestone would come.
The newly engaged couple's next chapter comes after a nearly decade-long relationship. The couple confirmed their romance on Instagram in May 2017, following their first public appearance at the Best FIFA Football Awards in Zurich earlier that year.
Who is Georgina Rodriguez?
Rodriguez, 31, is an Argentine-Spanish model, entrepreneur, social media influencer, and now, the fiancée of Cristiano Ronaldo.
She is also the star of the reality series "I am Georgina," which, over three seasons, captures the personal and professional life of the famous mother and businesswoman.
With Ronaldo, she shares daughters Bella, 3, and Alana, 7. Rodriguez is also the stepmother of Ronaldo's twin children, Eva Maria and Mateo, both 8, and 15-year-old son Cristiano Jr.
In April 2022, the couple revealed that Bella's twin newborn brother tragically died, writing in a joint Instagram post that they experienced "the greatest pain any parent can feel."

College-bound? Get unlimited data for $25 a month with Metro by T-Mobile's BYOD offer 📲
Stay connected for less with these affordable offers from Metro by T-Mobile.
Is your child heading back to school or off to college soon? If so, finding a reliable phone service carrier with affordable plans to make sure you're always in touch with them might be at the top of your back-to-school shopping list.
Metro by T-Mobile is a reliable phone service provider known for consistently rolling out enticing new offers and promotions, like Metro's 5-Year Price Guarantee, that helps keep our readers on-budget and connected!
One of the sweetest offers right now is Metro's Bring Your Own Device plan (BYOD) for just $25 per month (fees and taxes included)—and that price is guaranteed for five years! There's truly no better time than now to make the switch and start saving on your monthly expenses.
Check out more details about this Metro by T-Mobile offer below:
What do you get with the Bring Your Own Device Plan at Metro?
When you decide to make the best money-saving switch to Metro, new customers can bring their own phone and pay just $25 per month (taxes and fees are included) when you sign up for Autopay. This BYOD plan will offer you:
- Unlimited 5G data at no extra cost—all on T-Mobile’s nationwide 5G network.
- Unlimited talk and text, so you'll never have to worry about overage fees again.
- T-Mobile Tuesdays: Metro customers get free stuff and exclusive deals on food, gas, entertainment and more in the Metro app.
- Scam Shield: Helps protect our customers from pesky scam calls with useful features like Scam ID, Scam Block and Caller ID.
What are the benefits of bringing my own device to Metro by T-Mobile?
There are many great benefits to making the switch to Metro using their Bring Your Own Device offer, but our favorite is definitely the money-saving aspect. What's even better is that beyond the affordability, Metro by T-Mobile also offers these surprising additional perks:
- Keep your phone and your phone number: You can continue using the phone you already love and are familiar with, plus avoid the hassle of having to migrate all your data and details to a new phone. Note: When you sign up online, you have the option of getting a new number or keeping your existing number. If you shop in-store, you will have to port your number to obtain this deal.
- No contracts, no surprises: Say goodbye to being locked into long-term commitments. Metro offers prepaid plans, meaning you pay upfront and never have to worry about hidden fees or overage charges.
- Powered by T-Mobile's reliable nationwide 5G network: Making the switch doesn't mean you're compromising on coverage. Metro by T-Mobile utilizes the same expansive and fast T-Mobile 5G network, providing reliable service in more places across the country.
- 5-Year Price Guarantee: Metro guarantees that the price of your talk, text and 5G smartphone data won't change for at least five years.
Is my current phone compatible with Metro by T-Mobile's network?
Most unlocked GSM phones are compatible with Metro by T-Mobile, which operates on the robust T-Mobile network. To quickly confirm your phone's compatibility, simply visit the Metro by T-Mobile website and enter its IMEI number.
Keep in mind that for successful activation on Metro's network, your phone must be unlocked. If you still owe a balance on your device with your previous provider, they may charge you for that outstanding amount before unlocking it.

argos_summary: Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez are engaged after nine years of dating, with Rodriguez showcasing a stunning engagement ring valued at up to $5 million. The ring features a large oval-cut diamond, estimated to be between 20-25 carats, which a gemologist confirmed is realistic for high-profile clients, dispelling initial speculation that the image was AI-generated. The couple's engagement marks a significant milestone in their long-term relationship, which began in 2017.
